problem_definition.command_line: fluidity -v2 viscous_fs_zhong_A.flml >& A.log && fluidity -v2 viscous_fs_zhong_B.flml >& B.log

variables.variable:
from fluidity_tools import stat_parser as stat
file1 = "viscous_fs_zhong_A.stat"
finish_time_a = stat(file1)["ElapsedTime"]["value"][-1]

import calculate_order
file1 = "viscous_fs_zhong_A.stat" file2 = "viscous_fs_zhong_B.stat"
ab_convergence_fs = calculate_order.report_convergence(file1, file2)

from fluidity_tools import stat_parser as stat
file1 = "viscous_fs_zhong_B.stat"
finish_time_b = stat(file1)["ElapsedTime"]["value"][-1]
